General.Name: Phat Dat Real Estate Development Corp
General.Description: Phat Dat Real Estate Development Corporation engages in the construction and trading of real estate properties in Vietnam. The company undertakes civil and industrial projects, and bridges and road works; and provides real estate consulting, brokerage, and valuation services, as well as real estate management services. It also constructs houses of various kinds and public works; offers specialized construction services, real estate auction services and land use rights, and real estate trading center services; and trades in construction materials and other equipment. Phat Dat Real Estate Development Corporation was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
